about_the_game:
Explore mysterious Redimus in the pre-history World Well

The World Well

The World Well is a giant structure, named for its almost cylindrical shape. The well is dotted with land shaped like flower petals, and has spawned countless civilisations and is the source of magic's power. No one knows who built it, and according to datable sources, the deep, bottomless megastructure has existed for thousands of years.

Redimus

Redimus is where the story begins. A world reborn in ruins, it has spawned civilisations of many different races fighting over the Quartz, the main source of energy used to power magic. In the eighth century of the Rikki era, the invention of the "Chanting Machine", a magical device capable of automatically chanting spells brought the entire continent into the industrial age of magic.

A variety of new automated magical devices rapidly entered the work and life of the people. What followed was the huge consumption of quartz resources, causing countries to fall into a fierce competition for quartz veins. At the same time, the industrialisation of magic has also resulted in the unemployment of a large number of workers and low-ranking mages, and the world has been plunged into ever-expanding conflicts, and the shuffle of war is inevitable.

Vampire

Vampires are a powerful race in Redimus, possessing incredible magical power and resilience. They are militaristic, preying on human flesh and blood for food, and their greatest weakness is their fear of sunlight. Fortunately for them, however, they are guarded by a near-eternal dusk and night in the shadow zone created by the plate's shading.

Caro

Caro is A vampire-human hybrid, unrecognised by vampires due to its overly human-like features. Their unusual red pupils were also rejected in human society, and over time, they were distinguished by the name “Caro”. It has become a kind of "humanoid livestock" that is tacitly permitted to be sold as food for vampires to eat.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has a war between humans and vampires, including episodes of being enslaved, killed, and abused by vampires.

short_description: 814 R.E; the war is approaching. In Redimus, the chaotic world where magic, technology, slaves and vampires coexist, a young girl happens upon a magic gun that sets her on a journey of revenge. There is a burning manor behind her, and the road ahead disappears in the jungles of the night ...
